message: They're preparing for a Trump invasion! Not because of anything Obama has done! Stop blaming Obama for EVERYTHING!!!

The only reason that your pastor is not another Joel Osteen is because he can't find parishioners rich enough to put him in those digs. Every single opportunity that a preacher gets to make himself rich off of your tythes, he will take it, and there is nothing that the law will do about it. That opportunity to get rich off of an invisible product is one of the main reasons that religion was invented in the first place. And why do you think that you know Christianity better than anyone else? You are going off of the same book that Benny Hinn goes off of, and other millionaire preachers use to justify skimming. Don't be so sure that you have found the right way. You are basing your opinion off of the same bogus book that they are.

What is wrong with America STARTS right there , starts with corruption and selling AMERICANS for money , their bank accounts their Money wind fall ! Our politicians NO longer represent AMERICANS & they brag over the MILLIONS & MILLIONS they are receiving .. They are selling AMERICANS out and saying it out loud ! I'm appalled I'm disgusted and it needs to END! If DC wasn't corrupt and big Money & favors weren't at stake the Democrats , media & republicans wouldn't all together be trying to slam Trump ! He is the only One to fix this entire mess & they can't have him fix AMERICA to much corruption at stake . Fight America fight for what's right ' Wake up
